meanings.definition: A type of ancient Greek drinking cup with two horizontal handles.
meanings.sent1: During the museum tour, I saw a beautiful skyphoi on display.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist carefully examined the skyphoi found at the excavation site.
meanings.sent3: At the Greek-themed party, everyone sipped from skyphoi pretending to be ancient revelers.
meanings.sent4: The skyphoi, like graceful dancers, stood in a row on the shelf.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the skyphoi made them look like pieces of art.

meanings.definition: Plural form of skyphos, referring to multiple ancient Greek drinking cups with two horizontal handles.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a collection of skyphoi from different historical periods.
meanings.sent2: In the ancient Greek marketplace, merchants sold various skyphoi to customers.
meanings.sent3: The skyphoi clinked together like a cheerful chorus at the banquet.
meanings.sent4: The skyphoi, like loyal companions, accompanied the guests throughout the feast.
meanings.sent5: The sound of wine pouring into the skyphoi echoed in the dining hall.
